fields.name: Brawl:
fields.value: Use in conjunction with the Factional Attack. Target a number of players, based on your placement (top 3 = 3, top half = 2, bottom half = 1). You will use the Factional Attack on whichever target has the most visitors.

fields.name: Commotion (Passive):
fields.value: Your attacks are rampage attacks (attacking visitors with 0.9x attack power). Anyone who survives your attack will be roleblocked. Any Mafia visits (besides your own) to your Factional Attack target are astral that night.

fields.name: Disorderly Conduct (Passive):
fields.value: If you roleblock a Town Investigative player, they will learn "You were roleblocked by The Brawler!"
